metadata.title: CVE-2024-29158 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 through 1.14.3 contains a stack buffer overflow in H5FL_arr_malloc,resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer and causing denialof service or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
